title: Pixel 3xl broken by Android 11 update
content:
I got the OTA update for my Pixel 3XL today and when the device restarted, I had a slurry of issues. 
My notification panel (lockscreen and pull-down) is completely empty, I can hear notifications and see badges above apps but the panel remains empty.
My mobile data does not work - if I try to enable mobile data, the switch toggles but nothing happens. Re-opening settings shows the setting in the off position again
My recent items is completely broken - as soon as I enter recent items, my most recent app disappears and then it tells me "No recent items"
I cannot update any apps via the play store - I have tried everything short of a factory reset
Quick settings doesn't work, I can access the first 6 settings in the notification panel but cannot pull down again for more quick settings
The settings app doesn't have a search function anymore(though I'm not sure if that's a feature or a bug) 
I have tried everything but a factory reset - I cannot do that yet because my university requires an app for MFA and does not enable you to have a backup device. Once I get the MFA set up on another device I will try a factory reset. 
I've even tried sideloading the latest OTA for my device using ADB from here.

If anyone has run into any of these issues and has a fix, please share. I will update this post with the results of a factory reset.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
